_description: Model structure - formulas and relationships only

calculations.name: Model Period
calculations.description: Period counter (1, 2, 3, ...)

calculations.name: Ops Period
calculations.description: Operations period counter (0 until ops, then 1, 2, 3, ...)

calculations.name: Capex + Cont
calculations.description: CAPEX with contingency applied

calculations.name: Capex to Apply GST
calculations.description: CAPEX minus EPC-BESS (import) minus Land Transaction (stamp duty) - both GST-free

calculations.name: Tolling Revenue
calculations.description: Contracted tolling revenue

calculations.name: FCAS Revenue
calculations.description: Frequency control ancillary services

calculations.name: Market Arbitrage Revenue
calculations.description: Arbitrage revenue (L1.1 annual, /12 for monthly)

calculations.name: Minor Event Revenue
calculations.description: Minor augmentation event revenue (capacity * $/MW / frequency / 12, technical adj, CPI-indexed)

calculations.name: Major Event Revenue
calculations.description: Major augmentation event revenue (capacity * $/MW / frequency / 12, technical adj, CPI-indexed)

calculations.name: Market Event Revenue
calculations.description: Minor + Major event revenue

calculations.name: Merchant Revenue
calculations.description: FCAS + Arbitrage + Market Events (95% during Life Extension)

calculations.name: Total Revenue
calculations.description: Tolling + Merchant

calculations.name: Total OPEX (Nominal)
calculations.description: OPEX group sum

calculations.name: Gross Margin
calculations.description: Revenue minus OPEX

calculations.name: Monthly Decay Factor
calculations.description: Per-month decay multiplier based on days

calculations.name: Degradation Index
calculations.description: 1 before ops, then monthly compounding decay

calculations.name: Operating Adjustment
calculations.description: Combined technical adjustment factor

calculations.name: EBITDA
calculations.description: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, amortization

calculations.name: P&L Depreciation
calculations.description: D&A + IDC/CommFees amort + Refi fees amort + Maintenance capex D&A

calculations.name: EBIT
calculations.description: Earnings before interest and taxes

calculations.name: Interest Expense
calculations.description: From Operations Debt

calculations.name: EBT
calculations.description: Earnings before taxes (incl. agency fee, DSRF fees during ops). Establishment fees capitalised during construction and amortised via R14

calculations.name: Tax Expense
calculations.description: From Tax module

calculations.name: NPAT
calculations.description: Net Profit After Tax

calculations.name: Prior RE
calculations.description: RE before current period (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: P&L Dividends Declared
calculations.description: Dividends (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Share Capital Returned
calculations.description: Share capital repayment (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: RE - Movement
calculations.description: RE movement (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: RE - Closing
calculations.description: Retained earnings closing (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Operating CF WC Movement
calculations.description: Negative of NWC increase (increase uses cash)

calculations.name: Agency Fee
calculations.description: Facility agent fee (indexed by CPI). During construction: capitalised via R9110. During operations: expensed via R17

calculations.name: Operating CF
calculations.description: EBITDA + WC Movement

calculations.name: GST Paid on Capex
calculations.description: From GST module (gst_paid outflow, all periods)

calculations.name: GST Received (Operations)
calculations.description: GST receipts during operations (from module construction/operations split)

calculations.name: MRA Contribution
calculations.description: Cash contributed to MRA (funding outflow at F1.End)

calculations.name: MRA Release
calculations.description: Cash released from MRA at end of maintenance period

calculations.name: MRA Drawdown (Maintenance)
calculations.description: Cash inflow from MRA to fund maintenance capex (offsets R250 in Investing CF)

calculations.name: Maintenance Capex
calculations.description: Gross maintenance capex outflow (CPI-indexed, quarterly during F12)

calculations.name: GST Received (Construction)
calculations.description: GST refund received during construction (self-funding: prior period refund offsets current GST payment)

calculations.name: Investing CF
calculations.description: Investing CF subtotal

calculations.name: Construction Debt Drawdown
calculations.description: From Construction Funding module

calculations.name: Principal Repayment
calculations.description: From Operations Debt

calculations.name: Interest Paid
calculations.description: From Operations Debt

calculations.name: Total Debt Service
calculations.description: Principal + Interest + Agency Fee + DSRF Fees

calculations.name: Interest Income
calculations.description: Interest earned on prior period closing cash at C1.58 (% pa), monthly. Operations only; MAX(0,...) prevents interest on overdrafts

calculations.name: DSRA Shortfall Contribution
calculations.description: Placeholder - additional funding to DSRA when balance below target

calculations.name: DSRF Fees
calculations.description: Total DSRF fees (establishment + commitment + refinancing) from DSRF module

calculations.name: Upfront Fees Paid
calculations.description: Cash outflow for upfront financing fees

calculations.name: Commitment Fees Paid
calculations.description: Cash outflow for commitment fees

calculations.name: IDC Paid
calculations.description: Cash outflow for interest during construction

calculations.name: Share Capital Repayment
calculations.description: Return of equity capital (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Dividends Paid
calculations.description: Dividend distributions to equity (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Capex + Contingency
calculations.description: Cumulative capex with contingency during construction

calculations.name: IDC
calculations.description: From Construction Funding module

calculations.name: Upfront Fees
calculations.description: Establishment fee (1.35% of limit) + upfront fees ($2M) at financial close

calculations.name: Commitment Fees
calculations.description: Commitment fee on undrawn ops facility during construction (40% of 1.75% margin)

calculations.name: Financing Fees
calculations.description: Cumulative upfront fees + commitment fees

calculations.name: Agency Fees
calculations.description: Cumulative facility agent fee during construction (CPI-indexed, for S&U)

calculations.name: MRA Funding
calculations.description: MRA funded at end of construction (from MRA module)

calculations.name: GST Receivable (WC)
calculations.description: Peak GST receivable during construction (fixed WC amount). Matches Excel S&U methodology - funds peak WC need, zero after construction.

calculations.name: DSRF Facility Limit
calculations.description: DSRF facility limit (notional, from DSRF module)

calculations.name: Funded Fees & Other Uses
calculations.description: All non-Capex, non-GST construction uses: Financing Fees + Agency Fees + MRA Funding + DSRA Funding + DSRF Fees

calculations.name: Funding Window
calculations.description: Extended construction funding window (includes COD for DSRF/MRA funding)

calculations.name: Total Uses
calculations.description: Capex + IDC + Funded Fees & Other Uses + GST Paid

calculations.name: GST Received
calculations.description: Cumulative GST refunds received during construction

calculations.name: Senior Debt
calculations.description: From Construction Funding module

calculations.name: Committed Equity
calculations.description: Equity is the residual: Total Uses - GST Received - Senior Debt

calculations.name: Total Sources
calculations.description: GST Received + Senior Debt + Committed Equity

calculations.name: Sources = Uses Check
calculations.description: Should be 0. Positive = excess sources, Negative = shortfall

calculations.name: Construction Equity Injection
calculations.description: Equity drawdown + IDC (both equity-funded)

calculations.name: Financing CF (ex-Dist)
calculations.description: Financing flows excluding shareholder distributions

calculations.name: Financing CF
calculations.description: Sum of all financing flows (including distributions)

calculations.name: Net CF (ex-Dist)
calculations.description: Net cashflow before shareholder distributions

calculations.name: Net Cashflow
calculations.description: Net cashflow including distributions

calculations.name: Cash Closing Balance
calculations.description: Final cash balance (includes all distributions)

calculations.name: SC - Cash Available
calculations.description: Cash available for SC repayment (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: SC - Repayment
calculations.description: Share capital repayment (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: SC - Cumulative Returned
calculations.description: Running total capital returned (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Cash Available
calculations.description: Cash available for distributions (from M7)

calculations.name: RE - Opening Balance
calculations.description: Retained earnings opening (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: RE - NPAT
calculations.description: NPAT (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: RE - Test Result
calculations.description: RE test result (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: NPAT - Test Result
calculations.description: NPAT test result (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: FCFF
calculations.description: Free Cash Flow to Firm

calculations.name: FCF Debt Drawdown
calculations.description: Construction + Ops debt

calculations.name: FCFE
calculations.description: Free Cash Flow to Equity

calculations.name: Monthly Discount Rate
calculations.description: WACC converted to monthly

calculations.name: Discount Factor
calculations.description: Cumulative discount factor for NPV

calculations.name: Contingent Equity
calculations.description: Additional equity calls beyond initial (if any)

calculations.name: Equity Injections
calculations.description: Periodic equity drawdowns during construction (outflow)

calculations.name: Dividends
calculations.description: Dividend distributions to equity (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Share Capital Repayment
calculations.description: Return of equity capital (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Investor Tax
calculations.description: Withholding tax on distributions (outflow)

calculations.name: Terminal Value
calculations.description: Fixed terminal value ($17.5M) indexed by CPI at TV period

calculations.name: Net Cash Flow to Equity
calculations.description: Total equity cash flows for IRR calculation

calculations.name: Contracted CFADS
calculations.description: EBITDA allocated to contracted revenue (Tolling)

calculations.name: Merchant CFADS
calculations.description: EBITDA allocated to merchant revenue (FCAS + Arb)

calculations.name: DSCR
calculations.description: Debt Service Coverage Ratio

calculations.name: Total CFADS
calculations.description: Combined contracted + merchant CFADS for ADSCR calculation

calculations.name: Contracted CFADS Post Capex
calculations.description: Contracted CFADS (maintenance already in OPEX/EBITDA)

calculations.name: Merchant CFADS Post Capex
calculations.description: Merchant CFADS (maintenance already in OPEX/EBITDA)

calculations.name: Total CFADS Post Capex
calculations.description: Total CFADS after maintenance capex deduction

calculations.name: Debt Opening Balance
calculations.description: From iterative debt sizing module

calculations.name: Debt Interest Paid
calculations.description: From iterative debt sizing module

calculations.name: Debt Principal Repayment
calculations.description: From iterative debt sizing module

calculations.name: Debt Service (P+I)
calculations.description: Interest + Principal from iterative debt sizing module

calculations.name: Debt Closing Balance
calculations.description: From iterative debt sizing module

calculations.name: Total Capital Additions
calculations.description: Per-period base capex during construction only - D&A depreciable base. IDC, fees excluded (separate amortising assets). Contingency excluded (buffer, not asset cost).

calculations.name: D&A Opening Book Value
calculations.description: From D&A module

calculations.name: D&A Asset Addition
calculations.description: From D&A module

calculations.name: D&A Depreciation Expense
calculations.description: From D&A module

calculations.name: D&A Accumulated Depreciation
calculations.description: From D&A module

calculations.name: D&A Closing Book Value
calculations.description: From D&A module

calculations.name: Tolling Quarterly Accrual
calculations.description: Rolling quarterly sum of tolling revenue (resets after each QE)

calculations.name: Tolling Receivable
calculations.description: Tolling AR - accrues monthly, collected at quarter end

calculations.name: Merchant Receivable
calculations.description: Merchant revenue receivable (days-based)

calculations.name: Receivables
calculations.description: Tolling (quarterly) + Merchant (days-based)

calculations.name: Payables
calculations.description: OPEX * Payable Days / Days Per Month

calculations.name: Net Working Capital
calculations.description: Receivables minus Payables

calculations.name: Net WC Movement
calculations.description: Change in NWC = Closing NWC - Prior NWC

calculations.name: Tax Taxable Income
calculations.description: From Tax module

calculations.name: Loss Pool Opening
calculations.description: From Tax module

calculations.name: Losses Utilised
calculations.description: From Tax module

calculations.name: Loss Pool Closing
calculations.description: From Tax module

calculations.name: Tax Net Taxable Income
calculations.description: From Tax module

calculations.name: Tax Payable
calculations.description: From Tax module

calculations.name: All-in Interest Rate - Construction (%)
calculations.description: Base Rate (L2.2) + Construction Margin (C1.32 = 1.8%)

calculations.name: All-in Interest Rate - Operations (%)
calculations.description: Base Rate (L2.2) + Operations Margin (C1.33 = 1.75%)

calculations.name: Cash & Cash Equivalents
calculations.description: Closing cash position

calculations.name: Construction WIP
calculations.description: Cumulative base capex during construction (zero after COD â€” asset transfers to PP&E via D&A module). IDC, fees are separate amortising assets. Contingency not capitalised until spent.

calculations.name: PP&E (Net Book Value)
calculations.description: D&A closing balance (net of accumulated depreciation, post-COD)

calculations.name: Trade Receivables
calculations.description: Tolling + Merchant receivables

calculations.name: GST Receivable
calculations.description: GST receivable closing balance from GST module

calculations.name: MRA Balance
calculations.description: Maintenance reserve account closing balance

calculations.name: IDC + Commitment + Agency Fees (NBV)
calculations.description: During construction: cumulative IDC+comm+agency fees. During operations: amortising balance (15yr SL)

calculations.name: Upfront Fees (NBV)
calculations.description: During construction: cumulative upfront fees. During operations: amortising balance (3yr SL)

calculations.name: Short Term Maintenance (NBV)
calculations.description: Maintenance capex net book value (5yr SL depreciation)

calculations.name: Total Assets
calculations.description: Cash + WIP + PP&E + IDC/CommFees + Upfront Fees + Receivables + GST + MRA + Maint Capex

calculations.name: Construction Debt
calculations.description: Cumulative senior debt drawn during construction (M4.2), zero after COD

calculations.name: Operations Debt
calculations.description: Operations debt closing balance (M1.6), active from COD

calculations.name: Trade Payables
calculations.description: OPEX-based payables (30-day terms)

calculations.name: Total Liabilities
calculations.description: Construction Debt + Operations Debt + Payables

calculations.name: Share Capital
calculations.description: Construction: cumulative equity drawn + IDC (both equity-funded) gated by F1. Operations: SC closing from distributions module gated by F2.

calculations.name: Retained Earnings
calculations.description: Retained earnings closing balance

calculations.name: Total Equity
calculations.description: Share capital + retained earnings

calculations.name: Total L + E
calculations.description: Total liabilities plus total equity

calculations.name: Balance Check
calculations.description: Should be zero if B/S balances (Total Assets - Total L&E)

calculations.name: NPV (FCFF)
calculations.description: Net Present Value of Free Cash Flow to Firm

calculations.name: NPV (FCFE)
calculations.description: Net Present Value of Free Cash Flow to Equity

calculations.name: Equity Cumulative CF
calculations.description: Running total of equity cash flows for payback tracking

calculations.name: Equity Payback Flag
calculations.description: 1 in the period when equity cumulative CF first turns positive

calculations.name: Equity Payback Period
calculations.description: Period number of equity payback (0 if no payback yet)

calculations.name: Cumulative CFADS
calculations.description: Running total of CFADS during debt service period

calculations.name: Cumulative Debt Service
calculations.description: Running total of debt service during debt service period

calculations.name: ADSCR (Average)
calculations.description: Average DSCR: cumulative CFADS / cumulative debt service. Measures overall project debt coverage.

calculations.name: LLCR
calculations.description: Loan Life Cover Ratio: NPV of remaining CFADS (during debt period) / outstanding debt

calculations.name: O&M MSA
calculations.description: Operations & Maintenance MSA cost (CPI-indexed, ops only)

calculations.name: Land Lease
calculations.description: Land lease payments (CPI-indexed, ops only)

calculations.name: Connection Opex
calculations.description: Network connection charges (CPI-indexed, ops only)

calculations.name: SPV Costs
calculations.description: Special purpose vehicle administration costs (CPI-indexed, ops only)

calculations.name: Asset Management Fees
calculations.description: Asset management fee (CPI-indexed, ops only)

calculations.name: Maintenance Capex & O&M Charges
calculations.description: Maintenance capex and additional service O&M charges (CPI-indexed, ops only)

calculations.name: Insurance (yrs 1-2)
calculations.description: Insurance premiums for first 2 years of operations (CPI-indexed)

calculations.name: Insurance (yrs 3+)
calculations.description: Insurance premiums from year 3 onwards (CPI-indexed)

calculations.name: Total OPEX Breakdown
calculations.description: Sum of all OPEX components (should reconcile to -R9, i.e. S1 * I2)

calculations.name: Total Capex
calculations.description: Total capex ex contingency (per period)

calculations.name: Total Construction Outflows
calculations.description: All construction outflows: capex + IDC + fees + MRA + GST

calculations.name: Total Funding
calculations.description: GST received + equity drawdown + debt drawdown

calculations.name: IDC+Comm Amort: Total Capitalised
calculations.formula: CUMSUM(R9022) + CUMSUM(R146 * R9999) + CUMSUM(S3 * I2 * R9999) + CUMSUM(R9082 * R9999)
calculations.description: Cumulative IDC + commitment fees + agency fees + DSRF fees during construction (constant after COD)

calculations.name: IDC+Comm Amort: Addition
calculations.description: One-time transfer at COD of total capitalised IDC + commitment fees

calculations.name: IDC+Comm Amort: Opening
calculations.formula: MAX(0, (CUMSUM(R9111) - R9111) - R9110 / C1.59 / T.MiY * (CUMSUM(F2) - F2))
calculations.description: Prior period closing (CUMSUM pattern, no SHIFT)

calculations.name: IDC+Comm Amort: Amort Expense
calculations.description: Monthly straight-line amortisation over C1.59 years

calculations.name: IDC+Comm Amort: Accumulated
calculations.description: Cumulative amortisation expense

calculations.name: IDC+Comm Amort: Closing NBV
calculations.formula: MAX(0, CUMSUM(R9111) - R9110 / C1.59 / T.MiY * CUMSUM(F2))
calculations.description: Net book value after amortisation

calculations.name: Upfront Fees Amort: Total Capitalised
calculations.description: Cumulative upfront fees during construction (constant after COD)

calculations.name: Upfront Fees Amort: Addition
calculations.description: One-time transfer at COD of total capitalised upfront fees

calculations.name: Upfront Fees Amort: Opening
calculations.formula: MAX(0, (CUMSUM(R9121) - R9121) - R9120 / C1.60 / T.MiY * (CUMSUM(F2) - F2))
calculations.description: Prior period closing (CUMSUM pattern, no SHIFT)

calculations.name: Upfront Fees Amort: Amort Expense
calculations.description: Monthly straight-line amortisation over C1.60 years

calculations.name: Upfront Fees Amort: Accumulated
calculations.description: Cumulative amortisation expense

calculations.name: Upfront Fees Amort: Closing NBV
calculations.formula: MAX(0, CUMSUM(R9121) - R9120 / C1.60 / T.MiY * CUMSUM(F2))
calculations.description: Net book value after amortisation

calculations.name: Short Term Maintenance: Ops Flag (post F12 onset)
calculations.description: 1 during operations from F12 onset onwards, 0 before. Used to gate depreciation timing.

calculations.name: Short Term Maintenance: Total Capitalised
calculations.description: Cumulative CPI-indexed maintenance capex during F12

calculations.name: Short Term Maintenance: Addition
calculations.description: Periodic maintenance capex addition (quarterly, CPI-indexed)

calculations.name: Short Term Maintenance: Opening
calculations.description: Prior period closing NBV (CUMSUM pattern, no circular deps)

calculations.name: Short Term Maintenance: Closing NBV
calculations.formula: MAX(0, CUMSUM(R9131) - CUMSUM(R9131) / C1.61 / T.MiY * CUMSUM(R9129))
calculations.description: Net book value after depreciation (depreciation starts at F12 onset)

calculations.name: Short Term Maintenance: Depreciation Expense
calculations.description: Depreciation = Opening + Addition - Closing (derived from stock identity, guarantees BS balance)

calculations.name: Short Term Maintenance: Accumulated
calculations.description: Cumulative depreciation expense
